main event: A person reported seeing a bright blue-green light in the sky that fell straight down and then went out, without any fluttering or seeming to hit anything.
interesting points: The light was the biggest and brightest the witness had ever seen.
The light fell straight down from the sky in a steady, constant motion.
The light just went out and did not appear to hit anything.
The witness was an Instrument Chief located in Washington, D.C.
